## useDefaultHandleApiError() function

Returns a default handler function for API errors. It will log the error and add a default error message to state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useDefaultHandleApiError(): (e: unknown) => void;
```
**Returns:**

(e: unknown) =&gt; void
